attributes.action: Give more power to teachers to discipline disruptive and antisocial pupils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the regularity that my son and many other children are beaten and bullied by other pupils at school and the apparent inability of teachers to stop and control the disruptive children responsible, I feel it is now time to give more powers of discipline to the school Teachers and Headmasters.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give more power to teachers to discipline disruptive and antisocial pupils."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
